GT_Sentence: "in 2024, the election is going to be about mobilization,” lake told reporters. “there is no question that the biggest contest between the two parties is going to be who can get their voters out to vote. democrats have an enthusiasm gap today, and the progressive alliance and democrats have fissures within their constituency that makes getting out the vote even more important. the biggest bloc of potential voters by far is low-income, low-wage voters. increased participation even by miniscule percentages could be game changers. it is a massive voter engagement that is being started here today.”
